entities.name: krum
entities.description: Krum is described as a person who is rising gently into the air, indicating that he is likely a character in a fantasy or magical context. The description of his red robes shining with blood from his nose suggests that he may be injured or wounded.

entities.name: bagman
entities.description: Bagman is described as a person who is shouting 'IRELAND WINS!' indicating that he is likely a fan or supporter of the Irish team. The fact that he seems to be taken aback by the sudden end of the match suggests that he may not have expected Ireland to win.
